portfoliia.title: Portfoliia
portfoliia.description: I created Portfoliia to make building professional portfolios and resumes simple and fast. This CMS-powered platform has helped over 100 users create stunning portfolios. It also includes insightful analytics to track their performance.

marokug.title: Marokug
marokug.description: At Marokug, I collaborated with a team of frontend and backend developers to create an online learning platform. Marokug empowers students to explore and learn a wide range of courses at their own pace, test their understanding through interactive quizzes and exams, and deepen their knowledge with additional learning materials.

deeperlifehighschool.title: Deeper Life High School
deeperlifehighschool.description: I collaborated with a team to develop the official website for Deeper Life High School. This website enhanced the school's online presence by providing an intuitive user interface, improving accessibility, and incorporating dynamic content. It digitalized processes such as admission, result management, and student information systems, streamlining operations and making information easily accessible to students, parents, and staff.

mtalers.title: Mtalers
mtalers.description: Mtalers is an educational platform developed for a client, focusing on providing a comprehensive learning experience. It incorporates various technologies such as jQuery, Php and MySql to deliver interactive and engaging educational content. The platform aims to enhance the learning process through its user-friendly interface and extensive functionality.

geegpayFrontendChallenge.title: Geegpay Frontend Challenge
geegpayFrontendChallenge.description: I converted a Figma design to HTML in the Geepay Frontend Challenge. Analyzed design, hand-coded clean & semantic HTML, ensured responsiveness & accessibility, tested & refined for a pixel-perfect outcome.

music website.title: Beat Website for Prod. Kayks
music website.description: This project is a dynamic and immersive beat website crafted for the talented music producer, Kayks. Utilizing technologies such as Next.js, Tailwind, PostgreSQL and RESTful Api, the website provides a seamless platform for showcasing Kayks' musical creations (such as: beats, final mixes, mashups and lots more). From elegant design elements to a user-friendly interface, the website aims to enhance the overall music discovery experience.

jujora.title: Jujora
jujora.description: At Jujora, I built an e-commerce app connecting farmers directly with buyers. Shop fresh produce, support local farmers, and enjoy transparency in your food supply chainâ€”all in one place.

strender.title: Strender
strender.description: Web app for all your sports needs! Access news, scores, and highlights across every sport. Engage with anonymous comments and more. Your go-to sports hub, all in one place.

myPortfolio.title: My Portfolio 2.0
myPortfolio.description: My myPortfolio 2.0 is the second showcase of my personal projects and accomplishments. Built with a blend of HTML, CSS, Typescript, React, and JSON, this portfolio highlights my skills and experiences. It serves as a platform to display my diverse range of projects, providing an insight into my expertise and dedication to web development. The live preview allows visitors to explore and interact with the projects showcased. Check out the source code on GitHub to delve deeper into the development process.
